metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3138 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
named contains a feature which allows operators to issue commands to arunning server by communicating with the server process over a controlchannel, using a utility program such as rndc. A regression introduced in arecent feature change has created a situation under which some versions ofnamed can be caused to exit with a REQUIRE assertion failure if they aresent a null command string. Affects BIND 9.9.9->9.9.9-P7,9.9.10b1->9.9.10rc2, 9.10.4->9.10.4-P7, 9.10.5b1->9.10.5rc2,9.11.0->9.11.0-P4, 9.11.1b1->9.11.1rc2, 9.9.9-S1->9.9.9-S9.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-3138` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

bind9 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
bind9-host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
bind9utils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
dnsutils - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
host - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libbind9-140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libdns-export162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libdns162 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libirs-export141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libirs141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisc-export160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisc160 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisccc-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisccc140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisccfg-export140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
libisccfg140 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
liblwres141 - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
lwresd - 1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: bind9 package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:9.10.3.dfsg.P4-8ubuntu1.6').
